oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Appalachian Exposition. The Cosy (Cozy) Home.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Cosy (Cozy) Home of EVERYBODY'S and THE DELINEATOR. Probably the most talked-of exhibit at The Appalachian Exposition. Main Building. Knoxville, Tenn. Sept. 12th to Oct. 12th. Postmarked 1911.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Postcards; Exhibitions; Fairs;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
